line_1: But ask the noble drudge in state-affairs,
line_2: Escap'd from office and its constant cares,

line_1: (Old Inmates of the Place) but State-Affairs:
line_2: And on their Brow sat every Nation's Cares.

line_1: (Old Inmates of the Place) but State-Affairs:
line_2: The World by them is parcel'd out in Shares,

line_1: (Old Inmates of the Place) but State-Affairs:
line_2: And the sage Berry sun-burnt Mocha bears
